    Ph.D. student in statistics and signal processing for astrophysics

    Resume

    Experience

    Sept. 2022 – Oct. 2025
    Ph.D. in statistical learning applied to the analysis of the interstellar medium (ISM) at IRAM (Grenoble) & IM2NP (Toulon).
    PH.D. supervisors: Antoine Roueff & Jérôme Pety
    Feb. 2022 – July 2022
    Engineering school end-of-studies internship at Institut Fresnel (Marseille).
    Statistical analysis & signal processing for radio observations of the Orion B interstellar cloud.
    Supervisor: Antoine Roueff.
    May 2021 – Aug. 2021
    Research engineer internship at IPAG (Grenoble).
    Hyperspectral data analysis for exoplanet detection through the case of the β Pictoris system.
    Supervisors: Mickaël Bonnefoy & Anne-Marie Lagrange.

    Academic background

    2019 - 2022
    Engeneer’s degree in Signal and Image processing, Communication systems, Multimedia at PHELMA (Grenoble).
    2017 - 2019
    CPGE (MPSI-PSI) at Lycée Jeanne d’Albret (Saint-Germain-en-Laye).
